name: Paracetamol 500
details: Used for fever and mild pain relief. Suitable for adults and children above 12 years.

name: Amoxicillin 250
details: Antibiotic used for bacterial infections including throat and respiratory infections.

name: Vitamin C Tablets
details: Boosts immunity and helps in recovery from cold and flu.

name: Cough Syrup DX
details: Provides relief from dry cough and throat irritation.
